name: school gate
story: You have arrived at the renowned Masters Vessel Classical Academy that your mum went to,you really want to end up in the house she stayed in too
nav: Press 1 to the Admin Block or Press 2 to go to the Girls Hostel

name: admin block
story: You are now at the Admin Block to register yourself, You arrived late to school so you are worried
nav: Press 1 to go back and 2 to go to the Secretarys Office

name: secretarys office
story: You get to the Secretarys office and she gives you a form to fill. She tells you that you will have to explain to the principal why you are late
nav: Press 1 to go to the Principals Office

name: principals office
story: You get to the principal's office and you introduce yourself. She recognizes your surname and asks if any of your relations came to the school.  You tell her yes and alse your reason for coming late and she welcomes you
nav: Press 1 to go to your guardians office

name: guardians office
story: You get to your guardian's office whom your mum has told you is your grandmother's cousin, he welcomes you and asks about your family. He tells you to come to him if you have any issues. You say okay and head to the teacher's room.
nav: Press 1 to go to the teachers room

name: teachers room
story: You arrive at the teacher's room and you get assigned a class by your homeroom teacher. You need to find it

name: senior block
story: You arrive at the Senior block and head to the elevator
nav: Press 1 to get to your floor

name: 3rd floor
story: You get to the 3rd floor and spot your claass room at the end of the hall "SS2B", and start to walk down

name: class room
story: You are in SS2B, streesed from all the elders you had to meet and greet, you head to the empty seat at the end and sit down. Not long after it is break time
nav: Press 1 to head to the Talk shop(Kiosk), 2 to head to the toilet and 3 to head to the Girls Hostel

name: talk shop
story: You get to the Talk shop and you decide to buy some snacks to eat because you are hungry
nav: Press 1 to head to the Dining

name: dining room
story: You are at the dining, you find a seat and get started on your snacks. After eating, you urgently need to use the restroom
nav: Press 1 to go to the toilet

name: toilet
story: You get to the restroom and freshen up, then head to the Girls hostel to get assigned a house

name: girls hostel
story: You are now in the Girls Hostel, your mum told you about the 2 matron in the hostel
nav: Press 1 to go back. 2 to go to Pst Annes room, press 3 to go to Mummy Nurses room

name: pst Annes room
story: You are in Pst Annes room, she starts to give you  a lecture about the hostel and it rules
nav: Press 1 to go the Snr Prefects room

name: mummy nurse room
story: You are with Mummy nurse. She hugs you after you tell her your name and asks about your mum, she tells you to come to her if you need anything
nav: Press 1 to go the Snr Prefects room

name: Snr prefects room
story: You get to the Snr Prefects eoom, She asks you to choose which block you want to be in
nav: Press 1 for City of Love and 2 for City of Hope

name: city of love
story: You get to the block and now you have to choose your room. 1 out of 7 options you will get it right. Choose wisely
nav: Press 1 for House of Miriam,2 for House of Lydia,3 for House of Deborah,4 for House of Esther

name: miriam
story: YOU PICKED RIGHT, you get to the room and you see your mums signature on the wall, Congratulations you win the game

name: lydia
story: You get to house of Lydia and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!

name: deborah
story: You get to house of Deborah and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!

name: esther
story: You get to house of Esther and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!

name: city of hope
story: You get to the block and now you have to choose your room. 1 out of 7 options you will get it right. Choose wisely
nav: Press 1 for House of Phoebe,2 for House of Rachael,3 for House of Rebecca

name: phoebe
story: You get to house of Phoebe and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!

name: racheal
story: You get to house of Rachael and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!

name: rebecca
story: You get to house of Rebecca and you do not see your mums signature where she said it will be, you picked wrong, YOU LOSE!!!
